content.text: WIN A MASTER Chef MC pizza oven (valued at $250)

Staycation has never tasted so good! Draw July 7th, 2024. Get one entry for every $50 spent on Summer Smiles pool or spa care products at a participating retailer (up to a maximum purchase of $1,000). One winner will be drawn per retailer! Check the list of participating retailers to learn more about the contest and its rules.
